We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private ArmsIndex _trin;
// In Initialize()
_trin = TRIN(symbols);

// In OnData()
if (_trin.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "TRIN A D Ratio", _trin.ADRatio);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TRIN A D V Ratio", _trin.ADVRatio);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TRIN Current", _trin.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.trin = self.TRIN(symbols)

# In OnData()
if self.trin.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TRIN A D Ratio", self.trin.ADRatio);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TRIN A D V Ratio", self.trin.ADVRatio);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TRIN Current", self.trin.Current);
